prerequisites: Prerequisite: Psychology 250, Educational Studies 234 or consent of the instructor.
summary: An examination of recent literature on how adolescents develop their value system, explore their goals, begin to make life-framing decision, establish new relationships, and discover answers to the question "Who am I?" Course readings will involve primary literature, and the course is discussion-based.
title: Adolescent Cognitive Development: Developing an Identity and Life Plans
